thread.title: Delhi Air Quality Plunges to ‘Severe-Plus’ Category
thread.title_full: Delhi Air Quality Plunges to ‘Severe-Plus’ Category

author: newsdirectory3
title: Delhi Air Quality Plunges to ‘Severe-Plus’ Category
text:
Delhi⁣ Gasps for Air as Pollution Reaches ‘Severe-Plus’ ‍Levels for Fourth Straight ‍Day Delhi’s air quality plummeted to alarming levels ⁢on Thursday,marking the⁣ fourth consecutive day the city has been shrouded in a thick blanket of smog. The overall Air Quality Index (AQI) plunged into the ‘severe-plus’ category, raising serious health concerns for residents. ​While a slight improvement to the ‘severe’ ‌category is ⁢predicted for Friday, the situation remains dire.
1200/POLLUTION%20STANDALONE%202024 19 12 8.jpg”/> 320/POLLUTION%20STANDALONE%202024 19 12 8.jpg”/>
​ ‌ ‌People‌ wearing face masks amid thick smog in Delhi on Thursday.
​ ⁣
⁣ ‍ ⁣ ‌
The ‘severe-plus’ category, with an AQI reading between 451‍ and 500, ​poses significant health risks, particularly for vulnerable populations like children, the elderly, and those with respiratory conditions.Delhi’s 24-hour⁣ average AQI reached a staggering 451 on Thursday.The alarming situation has sparked criticism from ⁣the opposition Bharatiya Janata Party⁢ (BJP). virendra Sachdeva, president of the ⁣BJP’s Delhi unit, accused the ruling Aam Aadmi Party (AAP)⁢ government of inaction.
“People have been suffering ‌from pollution for an extended period,and for the last 72 hours,the city remains under Stage-IV of the ‌Graded Response Action Plan,” Sachdeva said.”This leaves all residents troubled‌ in one way or another. ⁤Neither Chief Minister Atishi ‌nor Surroundings Minister Gopal Rai⁣ has addressed the gravity‌ of the ‌situation.”
The city’s air quality is expected to remain a major concern in the coming days, highlighting the urgent need for effective ⁣measures to ⁤combat pollution and protect ⁢public health.
